descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod that I have ever made for any game so please don't judge to hard. This mod adds a follower named Tevin to the game. He is located at the Skyforge in Whiterun. Tevin is a Warrior Mage that uses magic and one-handed combat.


If you find any bugs or have any idea's for this mod please let me know! I WILL LISTEN TO YOU GUYS!


Feel free to use this mod in a YouTube video (or any kind of video), but please send me the link so I can watch it to. If you want to use this mod in another mod, please ask me first. I will most likely say yes.
author: SirPugzly
